laboratory_examinations.findings: Extremely low (11 ng/ml) using Immunotech kit.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: IGF-I levels remained low in contrast to IGFBP-3 and ALS levels, which were in the upper normal range or above.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 0.7 ng/ml after an overnight fast, peak concentration of 26 ng/ml after stimulation with ornithine.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: GH stimulation tests were performed showing variability in serum GH levels.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Basal IGF-I level of 51 ng/ml, reaching only 82 ng/ml after 5 days of GH injections.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Growth velocity increased when treated with 0.4 mg/kg/week GH.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 7 ng, for a normal range of 1 to 7 ng.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicated peaks of GH during spontaneous secretion assessment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Undetectable IGF-I using monoclonal assays, elevated IGF-I levels observed using polyclonal assay during improved food intake.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Levels varied significantly between assays; increased levels observed during a period of increased food intake.
